ARABIC: ٱلْحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّكَ فَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلْمُمْتَرِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: The truth is from your Lord, so on no account be among the doubters.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: The truth is from your Lord, so be not among those who are sceptics.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: This is in fact a Commandment from your Lord; so you should not have any doubt concerning this.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Never doubt that the essence of truth comes from your Lord
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: This is the Truth from your Lord, therefore (O those who listen) beware – do not be in doubt.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: This is) the truth from your Lord. So be you not one of those who doubt.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: The truth is from your Lord, therefore you should not be of the doubters.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: The truth comes from thy Lord; then be not among the doubters.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: It is the Truth from thy Lord (O Muhammad), so be not thou of those who waver.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Truth is what comes from your Lord; therefore, do not be of those who doubt.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: The truth is from thy Lord; be then thou not of the doubters.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: This is the truth from your Lord; so do not be among the skeptics.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: The Truth is from thy Lord; so be not at all in doubt.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (This is) the truth from your Lord. So be you not one of those who doubt.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: The truth comes from your Lord so do not be among the doubters.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: The truth is from your Lord, so do not be a skeptic.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: The truth is from your Lord, so never be among the doubters.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [2:147] The truth comes from your Lord; then be not among the doubters, who doubt it, that is to say, ‘[be not] of such a disposition’, which is more eloquent than merely saying, ‘do not waver’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (It is the Truth from thy Lord (0 Muhammad)) that you are a Prophet sent by Allah. (So be not thou of those who waver) who doubt whether they know or not.
